metadata.title: CVE-2020-5214 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description: In NetHack before 3.6.5, detecting an unknown configuration file option cancause a buffer overflow resulting in a crash or remote codeexecution/privilege escalation. This vulnerability affects systems thathave NetHack installed suid/sgid and shared systems that allow users toupload their own configuration files. Users should upgrade to NetHack3.6.5.

criterions.comment: nethack package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
